characters.name: Peter Pan
characters.subtitle: Leader dei Bimbi Sperduti
characters.author: Grace Tran

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q: Ho un Peter Pan – Leader dei Bimbi Sperduti ne Il Castello della Regina – Stanza dello Specchio, che ha 2{L}. Se sposto Peter Pan in Villa De Mon – Dimora di Crudelia, che ha 1 {L}, e poi lo sposto di nuovo ne Il Castello della Regina, posso usare la sua Ascoltavo le Tue Fiabe per ottenere 2 leggenda?
A: No. devi usare l’abilità Ascoltavo le Tue Fiabe di Peter Pan – Leader dei Bimbi Sperduti la prima volta che si sposta in un luogo ogni turno. Se nel tuo turno non si è spostato e lo sposti in Villa De Mon, ottieni 1 leggenda. Non puoi usare di nuovo la sua abilità Ascoltavo le Tue Fiabe per quel turno.

characters.flavor_text: Gli Illuminatori cercavano qualcuno che li aiutasse a ritrovare un libro magico scomparso, e Peter fu il primo ad offrirsi.
characters.rules_text: ASCOLTAVO LE TUE FIABE Una volta per turno, quando questo personaggio si sposta in un luogo, ottieni leggenda pari al di quel luogo.

characters.name: Principe Giovanni
characters.subtitle: Re Fasullo
characters.author: Koni

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q: Io ho 10 leggenda e il mio avversario ha 12 leggenda. Se vado all’avventura con il mio Principe Giovanni – Re Fasullo, che ha 2 {L}, posso usare la sua abilità Riscuotere le Tasse per far perdere 2 leggenda al mio avversario?
A: No. Quando un personaggio va all’avventura, ottiene immediatamente leggenda pari al suo {L}. Questo significa che per poter attivare l’abilità Riscuotere le Tasse di Principe Giovanni – Re Fasullo per far perdere leggenda a un avversario, questo deve avere più leggenda di te dopo aver contato anche i 2 punti leggenda ottenuti dall’avventura del Principe Giovanni.

characters.flavor_text: Fenomeno d'incapacità, nei libri di storia lui sarà...%—Sceriffo di Nottingham
characters.rules_text: RISCUOTERE LE TASSE Ogni volta che questo personaggio va all'avventura, ogni avversario con più leggenda di te perde 2 leggenda.

characters.name: Ursula
characters.subtitle: Ingannatrice di Tutti
characters.author: Matthew Robert Davies

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q: Quando posso giocare la canzone aggiuntiva usando l’abilità Che Affare di Ursula – Ingannatrice di Tutti?
A: Quando usi l’abilità Che Affare di Ursula – Ingannatrice di Tutti, devi giocare la canzone immediatamente dopo averla giocata la prima volta. Non puoi aspettare per usarla più avanti nel turno.

Q: L’unico personaggio in gioco è la mia Ursula – Ingannatrice di Tutti che al momento ha 1 segnalino danno. Se uso Ursula per cantare Let the Storm Rage On posso usare la sua abilità Che Affare per giocare la canzone una seconda volta?
A: Sì. Quando giochi Let the Storm Rage On, se c’è in gioco un personaggio che puoi scegliere a cui infliggere i 2 danni, lo devi fare. Anche se Let the Storm Rage On esilia la tua Ursula – Ingannatrice di Tutti, puoi comunque usare la sua abilità Che Affare. In questo caso non sarai in grado di infliggere 2 danni a un personaggio, poiché non ce ne sono in gioco ma puoi pescare lo stesso una carta.

Q: La mia Ursula – Ingannatrice di Tutti canta Abbiam Vinto Ancora Noi. Scelgo di mettere 4 carte in cima al mio mazzo e 1 carta in fondo. Se uso l’abilità Che Affare di Ursula per giocare di nuovo Abbiam Vinto Ancora Noi e scelgo di mettere 1 ulteriore carta in fondo al mio mazzo, dove devo mettere la mia copia di Abbiam Vinto Ancora Noi rispetto alle altre carte che ho messo in fondo al mio mazzo?
A: Abbiam Vinto Ancora Noi sarà l’ultima carta in fondo al tuo mazzo, a prescindere da quante carte hai messo in fondo al tuo mazzo ogni volta l’hai giocata. La carta giocata una seconda volta dall’abilità Che Affare di Ursula – Ingannatrice di Tutti va messa in fondo al tuo mazzo dopo che il suo effetto ha avuto termine.

characters.flavor_text: Non chiedo tanto — se non la leggenda più potente!
characters.rules_text: CHE AFFARE Ogni volta che questo personaggio canta una canzone, puoi giocare nuovamente quella canzone dagli scarti gratis, poi mettila in fondo al tuo mazzo.

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q: Se uso l’abilità Protection di Mouse Armor per dare alla mia Idra – Serpente Letale Resistere +1 e poi sfido Minni – Sempre Elegante con quell’Idra, posso usare la sua abilità Attento ai Denti per infliggere danni a Minni?
A: No. Minnie Mouse – Sempre Elegante ha 1 {S} e quindi infligge 1 danno all’Idra – Serpente Letale, ma Resistere +1 ridurrà quel danno di 1 prima che questo venga inflitto all’Idra. All’Idra, quindi, non viene inflitto alcun danno.

A: Sì. Nota che puoi farlo non appena uno dei due (o entrambi) entra in gioco.

characters.flavor_text: Farai tremare le stelle, davvero.%—John Silver

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q: Ho una Alice – Growing Girl e una Vaiana – Leader Nata preparate nello stesso luogo. Se Vaiana va all’avventura mentre Alice è preparata, Alice potrà andare all’avventura per questo turno?
A: No. L’Abilità Benvenuto Sulla Mia Barca di Vaiana – Leader Nata è obbligatoria e influenza tutti gli altri personaggi che si trovano nel suo stesso luogo. Anche se Alice – Growing Girl è preparate quando Vaiana va all’avventura, Alice non potrà andare all’avventura più tardi durante questo turno. Nota che, anche se Alice si spostasse in un altro luogo o se il luogo dove si trovano entrambi i personaggi venisse rimosso dal gioco, Alice non sarebbe comunque in grado di andare all’avventura per questo turno.

BENVENUTO SULLA MIA BARCA Ogni volta che questo personaggio va all'avventura mentre si trova in un luogo, prepara tutti gli altri personaggi in quel luogo. characters.name: Nonna Tala
characters.subtitle: Spirito dell'Oceano
characters.author: Jennifer Park / Ellie Horie

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q: Il mio avversario gioca Let It Go e sceglie la mia Nonna Tala- Spirito dell’Oceano per aggiungerla al mio calamaio. Ottengo leggenda dalla sua abilità Può Rivelarti Solo il Tuo Cuore Chi Tu Sia?
A: No. Il trigger dell’abilità Può Rivelarti Solo il Tuo Cuore Chi Tu Sia di Nonna Tala- Spirito dell’Oceano avviene solo se lei è in gioco quando una carta viene aggiunta al tuo calamaio. 
Quando si aggiunge un personaggio che è in gioco al calamaio tramite l’effetto di Let It Go, il personaggio prima lascia il gioco e poi viene messo nel calamaio; quindi, Nonna Tala non è in gioco quando la carta viene spostata nel calamaio e la sua abilità non può avere effetto. Nota che questo non cambia se la Nonna Tala è entrata in gioco con Trasformazione e c’è una carta sotto di lei.

characters.flavor_text: Lei sarà sempre con te, non importa quanto lontano ti porterà il tuo viaggio.
characters.rules_text: Trasformazione 5 (Puoi pagare 5 per giocare questa carta sopra a uno dei tuoi personaggi chiamato Nonna Tala.) PUÒ RIVELARTI SOLO IL TUO CUORE CHI TU SIA Ogni volta che una carta vene aggiunta al tuo calamaio, ottieni 1 leggenda.

characters.author: Alice Pisoni

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q: Ho 7 carte in mano e lo Sceriffo di Nottingham – Funzionario Corrotto in gioco. Poi gioco A Whole New World, che mi fa scartare tutte le carte che ho in mano nello stesso momento. Quanti danni posso infliggere con l’abilità È Giusto Che Sia Così dello Sceriffo?
A: 7 danni. Puoi usare l’abilità È Giusto Che Sia Così dello Sceriffo di Nottingham – Ufficiale Corrotto una volta per ogni carta che scarti, anche se le scarti tutte nello stesso momento. Se scarti 7 carte grazie all’effetto di A Whole New World. Puoi usare È Giusto Che Sia Così fino a 7 volte.

characters.flavor_text: Tredicesima Regola del Cattivo: arrafa tutto ciò che puoi, ma fallo con il sorriso.
characters.rules_text: È GIUSTO CHE SIA COSÌ Ogni volta che scarti una carta, puoi infliggere 1 danno a un personaggio avversario a tua scelta.

characters.rules_text: YES, YOUR MAJESTY Your Prince, Princess, King, and Queen characters get +1.

characters.name: Grumpy
characters.subtitle: Bad-Tempered
characters.author: Kendall Hale
characters.flavor_text: Sour as a green gooseberry!
characters.rules_text: There's Trouble A-Brewin'\ Your other Seven Dwarfs characters get +1.

characters.flavor_text: You couldn't pick a better friend.
characters.rules_text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their to another chosen character's this turn.)

characters.name: King Louie
characters.subtitle: Jungle VIP
characters.author: Hadjie Joos

additional_info.title: FAQ 2
additional_info.body:
Q: My King Louie- Jungle VIP has 6 damage on it. I use my King Louie to challenge a 2 strength character of my opponent’s. If King Louie banishes the opposing character in the challenge can I use his ability before he would be banished because of the challenge?

A: No, you cannot. Both characters involved in a challenge receive damage at the same time and are also banished due to taking damage equal to or greater than their willpower at the same time if applicable. This means that at the time King Louie’s ability is able to trigger he would already be banished and therefore no longer in play. Note that this does not change if King Louie is the character being challenged instead.

characters.flavor_text: Cool it, boy. Unwind yourself.
characters.rules_text: LAY IT ON THE LINE Whenever another character is banished, you may remove up to 2 damage from this character.

characters.name: Mickey Mouse
characters.subtitle: Friendly Face
characters.author: Veronica Di Lorenzo / Livio Cacciatore
characters.flavor_text: Come on in—there’s lots to explore.
characters.rules_text: GLAD YOU'RE HERE! Whenever this character quests, you pay 3 less for the next character you play this turn.

characters.name: Mufasa
characters.subtitle: Betrayed Leader
characters.author: Stefano Zanchi

additional_info.title: FAQ 2
additional_info.body:
Q: My Mufasa- Betrayed Leader is banished and I use his The Sun Will Set ability. The card on top of my deck when the ability is used is an action card. When I return that card to the deck does it return face up or face down?

A: Face down. All cards in the deck are face down at all times unless otherwise specified.

characters.rules_text: THE SUN WILL SET When this character is banished, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a character card, you may play that character for free and they enter play exerted. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.

characters.name: Mulan
characters.subtitle: Spirito Libero
characters.author: Amber Kommavongsa
characters.flavor_text: Ogni cosa è più bella quando sei libera di essere te stessa.
characters.rules_text: Aiutante (Ogni volta che questo personaggio va all’avventura, puoi aggiungere la sua alla di un altro personaggio a tua scelta per questo turno.)

characters.name: Mulan
characters.subtitle: Reflecting
characters.author: Lissette Carrera

additional_info.title: FAQ 1
additional_info.body:
Q: I quest with my Mulan- Reflecting and use her Honor to the Ancestors ability. The card on the top of my deck is a copy of Be Prepared and I chose not to play that card. What happens to the card in this case?

A: The card is returned to the top of your deck. Even if the card is a song card as long as you choose not to play it then the card is returned to the top of your deck, face down.

characters.rules_text: Shift 2 (You may pay 2 to play this on top of one of your characters named Mulan.) HONOR TO THE ANCESTORS Whenever this character quests, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a song card, you may play it for free. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.

characters.name: Nana
characters.subtitle: Darling Family Pet
characters.author: Filipe Laurentino
characters.flavor_text: Children are a dog’s best friend.
characters.rules_text: NURSEMAID Whenever you play a Floodborn character, you may remove all damage from chosen character.

characters.name: Pimpi
characters.subtitle: Animale Molto Piccolo
characters.author: Kiersten Hale
characters.flavor_text: Per essere un animale così piccolo, ha un cuore incredibilmente grande.

characters.name: Rapunzel
characters.subtitle: Gifted Artist
characters.author: Aubrey Archer

additional_info.title: FAQ 1
additional_info.body:
Q: Three of my characters have 2 damage each on them. If my Rapunzel- Gifted Artist sings Hakuna Matata in that situation, how many cards can I draw with her Let Your Power Shine ability?

A: 3 cards. Rapunzel- Gifted Artist’s ability triggers for each individual character of yours that has damage removed from them regardless of how much damage is removed from that character.

characters.rules_text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3 to play this on top of one of your characters named Rapunzel.) LET YOUR POWER SHINE Whenever you remove 1 or more damage from one of your characters, you may draw a card.

characters.name: Rapunzel
characters.subtitle: Raggio di Sole
characters.author: Aubrey Archer
characters.flavor_text: Tutti noi possiamo rendere il mondo un po' più luminoso, a modo nostro.
characters.rules_text: CAPELLI MAGICI — Rimuovi fino a 2 danni da un personaggio a tua scelta.

characters.name: Sleepy
characters.subtitle: Nodding Off
characters.author: Kendall Hale
characters.flavor_text: He never gets tired of naps.
characters.rules_text: YAWN! This character enters play exerted.

characters.name: Sneezy
characters.subtitle: Very Allergic
characters.author: Kendall Hale
characters.flavor_text: Look out! He’s gonna blow!
characters.rules_text: Ah-choo!\ Whenever you play this character or another Seven Dwarfs character, you may give chosen character -1 this turn.

characters.name: Snow White
characters.subtitle: Lost in the Forest
characters.author: LadyShalirin
characters.flavor_text: Why, you’re all alone, just like me.
characters.rules_text: I WON'T HURT YOU When you play this character, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

characters.name: Snow White
characters.subtitle: Unexpected Houseguest
characters.author: Samanta Erdini
characters.flavor_text: Nothing says ‘hello’ better than a fresh-baked pie.
characters.rules_text: How Do You Do?\ You pay 1 less to play Seven Dwarfs characters.

characters.name: Snow White
characters.subtitle: Well Wisher
characters.author: Javi Salas
characters.rules_text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4 to play this on top of one of your characters named Snow White.) WISHES COME TRUE Whenever this character quests, you may return a character card from your discard to your hand.

characters.name: The Queen
characters.subtitle: Commanding Presence
characters.author: Matthew Robert Davies / LadyShalirin

additional_info.title: FAQ 2
additional_info.body:
Q: I have a The Queen- Commanding Presence and a Flounder- Voice of Reason in play. My opponent has a Mickey Mouse- True Friend and a Maleficent- Sorceress. In this situation if I quest with my The Queen- Commanding Presence and use her Who is the Fairest? Ability, what characters can I choose for each part of her effect?

A: When using the Who is the Fairest? Ability of The Queen- Commanding Presence you must choose an opponent’s character to receive -4 strength. This means that you can only choose either Mickey Mouse or Maleficent to receive -4 strength in this example. When using the second part of the Who is the Fairest? Ability you may choose any character to receive +4 strength. In this example you may choose Mickey Mouse, Maleficent, The Queen or Flounder to receive +4 strength. Note that you must choose a character for each part of the ability so you are not able to decrease the strength of a character and not increase the strength of a character.

characters.rules_text: Shift 2 (You may pay 2 to play this on top of one of your characters named The Queen.) WHO IS THE FAIREST? Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character gets -4 this turn and chosen character gets +4 this turn.

characters.name: The Queen
characters.subtitle: Regal Monarch
characters.author: Eva Widermann
characters.flavor_text: Don’t question her. Don’t doubt her. And above all, don’t disobey her.

characters.name: Arthur
characters.subtitle: Wizard's Apprentice
characters.author: Jake Parker
characters.flavor_text: Hmm.. what spell should I try next?
characters.rules_text: STUDENT Whenever this character quests, you may return another chosen character of yours to your hand to gain 2 lore.

characters.subtitle: Rewarding Good Deeds
characters.author: Kiersten Hale
characters.flavor_text: To make Geppetto’s wish come true will be entirely up to you. —Blue Fairy
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) ETHEREAL GLOW Whenever you play a Floodborn character, you may draw a card.

characters.name: Chip the Teacup
characters.subtitle: Gentle Soul
characters.author: Aubrey Archer
characters.flavor_text: Wanna see me do a trick?

characters.name: Dr. Facilier

characters.author: Leonardo Giammichele
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

characters.subtitle: Gloves Off
characters.author: Cristian Romero
characters.flavor_text: The power of ice may not stop the flood, but it will help protect Lorcana.
characters.rules_text: Challenger +3 (While challenging, this character gets +3.)

characters.name: Fairy Godmother
characters.subtitle: Here to Help
characters.author: Hedvig Häggman-Sund
characters.flavor_text: Use a humdrum spell, and you’ll end up with humdrum magic. I like my magic to have something special!

characters.name: Fairy Godmother
characters.subtitle: Mystic Armorer
characters.author: Filipe Laurentino

additional_info.title: FAQ 1
additional_info.body:
Q: If I quest my Fairy Godmother- Mystic Armorer and use her “Forget the Coach, Here’s a Sword” ability and then play a Maui- Hero to All and challenge with that Maui, does he gain the Challenger +3 and “When this character is banished in a challenge, return this card to your hand” abilities from the “Forget the Coach, Here’s a Sword” ability?

A: Characters played after you use the “Forget the Coach, Here’s a Sword” ability will not gain Challenger +3 and “When this character is banished in a challenge, return this card to your hand”. Only characters in play when you quest with Fairy godmother gain the ability.

characters.rules_text: Shift 2 (You may pay 2 to play this on top of one of your characters named Fairy Godmother.) FORGET THE COACH, HERE'S A SWORD Whenever this character quests, your characters gain Challenger +3 and "When this character is banished in a challenge, return this card to your hand" this turn. (They get +3 while challenging.)

characters.name: Fairy Godmother
characters.subtitle: Pure Heart
characters.author: Matt Chapman
characters.flavor_text: We’ll have to hurry, because even miracles take a little time.
characters.rules_text: JUST LEAVE IT TO ME Whenever you play a character named Cinderella, you may exert chosen character.

characters.subtitle: Presenza Persistente
characters.author: Ellie Horie
characters.flavor_text: Potere. Bellezza. Heihei.
characters.rules_text: È TORNATO! Quando questo personaggio viene esiliato in una sfida, riprendi in mano questa carta.

characters.subtitle: Pinocchio's Conscience
characters.author: Isaiah Mesq
characters.flavor_text: Say, that's pretty swell.
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) THAT STILL, SMALL VOICE When you play this character, if you have a character named Pinocchio in play, you may draw a card.

characters.name: Kuzco
characters.subtitle: Wanted Llama
characters.author: Michaela Martin
characters.flavor_text: So there I was. Perfectly in control of the situation.
characters.rules_text: OK, WHERE AM I? When this character is banished, you may draw a card.

characters.name: Maga Magò
characters.subtitle: Volpe
characters.author: Alice Pisoni
characters.rules_text: INSEGUIRE IL CONIGLIO Quando giochi questo personaggio, esilialo o riprendi in mano un tuo altro personaggio a tua scelta. Lesto (Questo personaggio può sfidare nel turno in cui è stato giocato.)

characters.name: Madam Mim

characters.flavor_text: Did I say no purple dragons? Did I?
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) I WIN, I WIN! When you play this character, banish her or return another 2 chosen characters of yours to your hand.

characters.name: Maga Magò

characters.author: Mané Kandalyan / Pix Smith
characters.rules_text: Trasformazione 3 (Puoi pagare 3 per giocare questa carta sopra a uno dei tuoi personaggi chiamato Maga Magò.) SOLO IL DEMONIO UGUAGLIARE MI PUÒ — Gioca un personaggio con costo 4 o inferiore, gratis. Quel personaggio ottiene Lesto. Alla fine del turno, esilialo. (Può sfidare nel turno in cui viene giocato.)

characters.name: Maga Magò
characters.subtitle: Serpente
characters.author: Brian Weisz
characters.flavor_text: Ti ho tra le mie spire, ormai!
characters.rules_text: ASPETTA E VEDRAI Quando giochi questo personaggio, esilialo o riprendi in mano un tuo altro personaggio a tua scelta.

characters.name: Merlin
characters.subtitle: Crab
characters.author: Valentina Graziuso

additional_info.body:

A: Yes it does. Being placed into the inkwell facedown is treated as leaving play

characters.flavor_text: He’ll be out of this in a snap!
characters.rules_text: READY OR NOT! When you play this character and when he leaves play, chosen character gains Challenger +3 this turn. (They get +3 while challenging.)

characters.name: Merlin
characters.subtitle: Goat
characters.author: S. Shaw / L. Giammichele

additional_info.title: FAQ for all Merlin animal forms
additional_info.body:
Q: If Merlin is chosen by the effect of Let it Go and placed into my inkwell does his ability trigger?

A: Yes it does. Being placed into the inkwell facedown is treated as leaving play

characters.flavor_text: He always was a stubborn old goat.%—Madam Mim
characters.rules_text: HERE I COME! When you play this character and when he leaves play, gain 1 lore.

characters.name: Merlino
characters.subtitle: Coniglio
characters.author: Michaela Martin
characters.flavor_text: La giornata stava diventando a dir poco difficile.
characters.rules_text: HOPPITI HIP! Quando giochi questo personaggio e quando lascia il gioco, puoi pescare una carta.

characters.name: Merlin
characters.subtitle: Shapeshifter
characters.author: Matthew Robert Davies
characters.flavor_text: Oh, blast it all—I can’t make up my mind.
characters.rules_text: BATTLE OF WITS Whenever one of your other characters is returned to your hand from play, this character gets +1 this turn.

characters.name: Merlin
characters.subtitle: Squirrel
characters.author: Brian Weisz

additional_info.title: FAQ for all Merlin animal forms
additional_info.body:
Q: If Merlin is chosen by the effect of Let it Go and placed into my inkwell does his ability trigger?

A: Yes it does. Being placed into the inkwell facedown is treated as leaving play

characters.flavor_text: You can’t always trust to luck, boy.
characters.rules_text: LOOK BEFORE YOU LEAP When you play this character and when he leaves play, look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.

characters.name: Peter Pan's Shadow
characters.subtitle: Not Sewn On
characters.author: Giulia Riva
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) TIPTOE Your other characters with Rush gain Evasive.

characters.name: Pinocchio
characters.subtitle: Star Attraction
characters.author: Kapik
characters.flavor_text: With that personality, that profile, that physique... Why, I can see your name in lights, lights six feet high. —Honest John

characters.name: Pinocchio
characters.subtitle: On the Run
characters.author: Isaiah Mesq
characters.flavor_text: He raced into the Inklands without a thought.
characters.rules_text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3 to play this on top of one of your characters named Pinocchio.) LISTEN TO YOUR CONSCIENCE When you play this character, you may return chosen character or item with cost 3 or less to their player's hand.

characters.name: Pinocchio
characters.subtitle: Talkative Puppet
characters.author: Juan Diego Leon
characters.flavor_text: A lie keeps growing and growing until it’s as plain as the nose on your face. —Blue Fairy
characters.rules_text: TELLING LIES When you play this character, you may exert chosen opposing character.

characters.name: Winnie the Pooh
characters.subtitle: Mago del Miele
characters.author: John Loren
characters.flavor_text: Aveva sempre sentito una certa affinità con il miele. Entrambi erano dorati e dolci, e propensi a cacciarsi in situazioni appiccicose.

characters.name: Yzma
characters.subtitle: Scary Beyond All Reason
characters.author: Casey Robin

additional_info.title: Errata
additional_info.body:
Errata: The Cruel Irony ability was printed with an error. The printed version of Yzma-Scary Beyond All Reason’s Cruel Irony ability is as follows:
When you play this character, you may shuffle another chosen character into their player’s deck. That player draws 2 cards.

characters.rules_text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4 to play this on top of one of your characters named Yzma.) CRUEL IRONY When you play this character, shuffle another chosen character card into their player’s deck. That player draws 2 cards.

characters.name: Yzma
characters.subtitle: Without Beauty Sleep
characters.author: Pablo Hidalgo
characters.flavor_text: Yzma: Llamas! All I see when I close my eyes is llamas!%Kronk: Weird. I just saw one in the flood. Poor little guy.

characters.name: Arthur
characters.subtitle: Trained Swordsman
characters.author: Mario Oscar Gabriele
characters.flavor_text: It’s not just fancy horses and swinging a sword around, you know! A true master must use his brain as well as his blade. —Merlin

characters.name: Beast
characters.subtitle: Relentless
characters.author: Eri Welli

additional_info.title: FAQ 3
additional_info.body:
Q: My opponent has a copy of Flounder and 4 copies of Mouse Armor in play. On my opponent’s turn they used the Protection ability of all 4 copies of Mouse Armor and chose Flounder all 4 times, giving it Resist 4. In this situation if my Beast- Relentless challenges that opposing Flounder, can I use Beast’s Second Wind ability to ready him?

A: No, you cannot. If  a character with resist 4 is dealt 4 damage then all 4 damage is prevented by resist and therefore that character was not damaged.

characters.rules_text: SECOND WIND Whenever an opposing character is damaged, you may ready this character.

characters.name: Belle
characters.subtitle: Bookworm
characters.author: Jenna Gray
characters.flavor_text: There's nothing more tempting than a pile of unread books.
characters.rules_text: USE YOUR IMAGINATION While an opponent has no cards in their hand, this character gets +2.

characters.name: Belle
characters.subtitle: Hidden Archer
characters.author: Aisha Durmagambetova
characters.flavor_text: She slips through the trees as easily as shadow.
characters.rules_text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3 to play this on top of one of your characters named Belle.) THORNY ARROWS Whenever this character is challenged, the challenging character's player discards all cards in their hand.

characters.name: Bucky
characters.subtitle: Squirrel Squeak Tutor
characters.author: Alex Accorsi

additional_info.title: Errata
additional_info.body:
Starting August 9th, 2024, Bucky - Squirrel Squeak Tutor, will be changed as follows:

Cost: 2 --> 3
Keyword: Ward --> No keyword ability
Updated ability: \Squeak\ Whenever you play a Floodborn character, each opponent chooses and discards a card. --> Whenever you play a Floodborn character, if you used Shift to play them, each opponent chooses and discards a card.

characters.flavor_text: There’s a lot of nuance to squirrel. —Kronk
characters.rules_text: SQUEAK Whenever you play a Floodborn character, if you used Shift to play them, each opponent chooses and discards a card.

characters.name: Cheshire Cat
characters.subtitle: Always Grinning
characters.author: Alex Accorsi
characters.flavor_text: Alice felt quite confused. But I don’t see much ink here at all. How can the flood still be changing the Inklands?%Things are always changing, you know, said the cat. It would be quite a change if they didn’t.

characters.name: Cheshire Cat
characters.subtitle: From the Shadows
characters.author: Jeff Murchie
characters.rules_text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5 to play this on top of one of your characters named Cheshire Cat.) Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) WICKED SMILE — Banish chosen damaged character.

characters.name: Daisy Duck
characters.subtitle: Secret Agent
characters.author: Lissette Carrera
characters.rules_text: THWART Whenever this character quests, each opponent chooses and discards a card.

characters.name: Donald Duck
characters.subtitle: Perfect Gentleman
characters.author: Ron Baird

additional_info.title: FAQ 1
additional_info.body:
Q: If I chose not to draw with Donald Duck- Perfect Gentleman’s Allow Me ability, can my opponent still use it to draw a card?

A: Yes, they can. Each player individually decides whether or not they want to use the ability to draw a card at the start of your turn.

characters.rules_text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3 to play this on top of one of your characters named Donald Duck.) ALLOW ME At the start of your turn, each player may draw a card.

characters.name: Donald Duck
characters.subtitle: Sleepwalker
characters.author: Leonardo Giammichele
characters.flavor_text: Heading toward a rude awakening!
characters.rules_text: STARTLED AWAKE Whenever you play an action, this character gets +2 this turn.

characters.name: Dr. Facilier
characters.subtitle: Fortune Teller
characters.author: Ron Baird
characters.rules_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) YOU'RE IN MY WORLD Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character can't quest during their next turn.

characters.name: Enchantress
characters.subtitle: Unexpected Judge
characters.author: Isaiah Mesq
characters.flavor_text: Appearances can be deceiving.
characters.rules_text: TRUE FORM While being challenged, this character gets +2.

characters.name: Flynn Rider
characters.subtitle: Confident Vagabond
characters.author: Ron Baird
characters.flavor_text: I love a good fan club, but they could at least <try> to get the nose right!

characters.name: Flynn Rider
characters.subtitle: His Own Biggest Fan
characters.author: E. Meleranci / L. Giammichele

additional_info.title: FAQ 1
additional_info.body:
Q: If I am playing a 4 player game and one of my opponent’s has 2 cards in hand, another has 1 card in hand and my last opponent has no cards in hand, how much lore will my Flynn Rider- His Own Biggest fan have?

A: Flynn Rider will have 1 lore. Flynn loses one card for each card in every opponent’s hand, so adding the two cards in one of your opponent's hands together with the one in the other’s hand he will lose a total of 3 lore and have just 1 left.

characters.rules_text: Shift 2 (You may pay 2 to play this on top of one of your characters named Flynn Rider.) Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) ONE LAST, BIG SCORE This character gets -1 for each card in your opponents' hands.

characters.name: Gaston
characters.subtitle: Scheming Suitor
characters.author: Valerio Buonfantino
characters.flavor_text: Don't I deserve the best?
characters.rules_text: YES, I'M INTIMIDATING While one or more opponents have no cards in their hands, this character gets +3.

characters.name: Little John
characters.subtitle: Loyal Friend
characters.author: Cristian Romero
characters.flavor_text: What’s the rush, Rob? Take a load off! There’s plenty of time to go lookin’ for lore lost in that crazy ink.

characters.name: Lucifer
characters.subtitle: Cunning Cat
characters.author: Isabella Ceravolo

additional_info.title: FAQ 2
additional_info.body:
Q: If my opponent plays a Lucifer- Cunning Cat and I have only 1 card in my hand which is a character card do I have to discard it?

A: Yes. If you do not have an action card in hand when Lucifer- Cunning Cat is played you must choose to discard 2 cards. When you choose to discard more cards than you have left in hand you must discard as many cards as you can.

additional_info.title: FAQ 1
additional_info.body:
Q: I have a Prince John - Greediest of All in play and play a You Have Forgotten Me, causing my opponent to discard 2 cards. Can I choose to draw only 1 card with Prince John’s I Sentence You ability?

A: No, you cannot. When choosing to draw with Prince John’s I Sentence You ability you must draw equal to the number discarded. So in this example you would either draw 2 cards if you used the I Sentence You ability or 0 if you choose not to use it.

characters.flavor_text: Taxes! Taxes! Beautiful, lovely taxes!

A: Even though Lady Tremaine is your character your opponent chooses which character to banish with her effect. This means that despite Prince John’s ward he can be chosen to be banished by the effect and therefore your opponent can choose either of their characters to banish for the Power to Rule at Last ability.

additional_info.title: FAQ 1
additional_info.body:
Q: I control a Queen of Hearts- Sensing Weakness, a Jafar- Keeper of Secrets and have 1 card in my hand. If my Jafar- Keeper of Secrets challenges my opponent’s Stitch- New Dog and I use the Let the Games Begin ability of my Queen of Hearts, how much damage does Stitch take from the challenge?

A: 2 damage. Queen of Hearts- Sensing Weakness’ Let the Games Begin ability applies as soon as a challenge is declared, before the challenge itself has happened. This means that when the challenge occurs Jafar- Keeper of Secrets will see that you have 2 cards in hand and will gain 2 strength total from his Hidden Wonders ability.

characters.rules_text: Shift 2 (You may pay 2 to play this on top of one of your characters named Queen of Hearts.) LET THE GAME BEGIN Whenever one of your characters challenges another character, you may draw a card.

You do not have to put one of the cards to your hand but regardless of whether you put a card in your hand or not any card you looked at and did not put in your hand must be placed on the bottom of your deck.

characters.name: Moana
characters.subtitle: Of Motunui
characters.author: Nicholas Kole

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
If Moana – Of Motunui quests, can I choose which princesses I ready? If I had Princesses already readied or I ready them with other effects later in the turn, can they quest that turn?

A: If you choose to use Moana’s We Can Fix It ability to ready your other Princess characters, you must ready all of them. If you quest with Moana – Of Motunui, no other Princesses can quest for the rest of your turn, regardless of whether you chose to ready them with her ability or they are readied later in the turn.

characters.flavor_text: I am Moana of Motunui. You will board my boat, sail across the sea, and restore the heart of Te Fiti.
characters.rules_text: WE CAN FIX IT Whenever this character quests, you may ready your other Princess characters. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

additional_info.body:
Q: Say I have an Elsa in play and I choose a ready character for Anna – Heir to Arendelle’s ability Loving Heart. If that chosen character is exerted later in the turn, will they stay exerted during the start of the next turn?

A: Yes, the chosen character will stay exerted by Anna’s effect.

characters.subtitle: Agent Provocateur
characters.author: Isaiah Mesq

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q. If I control Dr. Facilier – Agent Provocateur and one of my Floodborn characters who used their Shift ability to be played on top of another card is banished in a challenge, do all cards in the stack go back to my hand?

A. No. Because the stack of cards all go to your discard pile first and become separate cards, you could only return the top card of the stack to your hand.

characters.rules_text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5 to play this on top of one of your characters named Dr. Facilier.) INTO THE SHADOWS Whenever one of your other characters is banished in a challenge, you may return that card to your hand.

A: Dr. Facilier’s effect will not occur until after you fully resolve the text on Friends on the Other Side.

characters.name: Marshmallow
characters.subtitle: Persistent Guardian
characters.author: Kendall Hale / Anh Dang

additional_info.title: FAQ - Challenges
additional_info.body:
Q: Are abilities on characters that occur when they’re banished in a challenge considered to happen during the challenge?

A: Abilities on characters that occur when they are banished in a challenge happen during that challenge.

Example: Marshmallow – Persistent Guardian has an ability that reads, “When this character is banished in a challenge, you may return this card to your hand,” and Cheshire Cat – Not All There has an ability that reads, “When this character is challenged and banished, banish the challenging character.”
If a player challenges and banishes Cheshire Cat with Marshmallow, the Cheshire Cat’s ability would banish Marshmallow during the challenge, allowing the challenging player to return Marshmallow to their hand.

characters.flavor_text: Hey! We were just talking about you! All good things, all good things. —Olaf
characters.rules_text: DURABLE When this character is banished in a challenge, you may return this card to your hand.

characters.author: Matthew Robert Davies

additional_info.title: FAQ - Costs
additional_info.body:
Q: If I use Freeze and choose to exert my opponent’s The Queen – Wicked and Vain, will The Queen’s exert ability I Summon Thee allow me to draw a card?

A: No. When an ability has a cost, the card’s player must pay that cost in order to use the ability. If another effect exerts The Queen, you don’t get to draw the card from I Summon Thee. Additionally, you won’t be able to use that ability until The Queen is readied.

characters.flavor_text: Sublime beauty matched with peerless cunning. Is there any question who is fairest?
characters.rules_text: I SUMMON THEE — Draw a card.

additional_info.title: Keywords - Challenger
additional_info.body:
Challenger is additive, meaning you add up all numerical instances of it for a combined
+N {S} gain.

Example: If you have two of Tinker Bell – Peter Pan’s Ally in play, each of them gives your Peter Pan characters Challenger +1, giving him a total of Challenger +2.

additional_info.title: FAQ - Challenges
additional_info.body:
Q: Are abilities on characters that occur when they’re banished in a challenge considered to happen during the challenge?

A: Abilities on characters that occur when they are banished in a challenge happen during that challenge.

Example: Marshmallow – Persistent Guardian has an ability that reads, “When this character is banished in a challenge, you may return this card to your hand,” and Cheshire Cat – Not All There has an ability that reads, “When this character is challenged and banished, banish the challenging character.”
If a player challenges and banishes Cheshire Cat with Marshmallow, the Cheshire Cat’s ability would banish Marshmallow during the challenge, allowing the challenging player to return Marshmallow to their hand.

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q: I have 2 cards in my hand. My Jafar – Keeper of Secrets challenges an opposing Flynn Rider – Charming Rogue. When do I use Flynn Rider’s Here Comes the Smolder ability? How much damage will Flynn Rider take from the challenge, considering Jafar’s ability Hidden Wonders?
A: You use Flynn Rider – Charming Rogue’s Here Comes the Smolder ability as soon as he’s chosen for an opposing character’s challenge. This means the challenging player must discard a card before any damage from the challenge is dealt to either character. In this case, you’ll have to discard 1 of your 2 cards, so you’ll have 1 card left. Jafar – Keeper of Secret’s ability increases his Strength by the amount equal to the number of cards in your hand, so Jafar will have 1 Strength when he deals damage to Flynn Rider.

characters.flavor_text: I didn’t want to have to do this, but you leave me no choice.. . .

additional_info.title: FAQ 2
additional_info.body:
Q: When I use Belle – Strange but Special’s Read a Book ability, can I place any card into my inkwell or does it need to have the inkwell icon?

A: Belle’s Read A Book ability only allows you to put another card into your inkwell; it doesn’t override any other rules of the normal process of adding a card to your inkwell. The card must have the inkwell icon and you must show it to all players before putting it in your inkwell.

additional_info.title: FAQ - Timing
additional_info.body:
Q. When more than one effect happens at the same time, what order do they resolve in?

A. If multiple effects of yours happen at the same time during your turn, you choose the order in which they occur, then resolve the effects in that order. After that, each other player resolves their effects in turn, starting with the player to your left.

Example: If you have Dr. Facilier – Agent Provocateur in play and your Gramma Tala – Storyteller is challenged and banished, you choose whether to return the Gramma Tala card to your hand or put it into your inkwell.

additional_info.title: FAQ - Challenges
additional_info.body:
Q: If I banish a shifted Floodborn card in a challenge while I have a card that lets me gain 1 lore when I banish a character, how much lore do I gain?

A: No matter how many cards are in a shifted character’s stack, they still count as a single character. Only the top card of a shifted character’s stack is considered banished for the purpose of effects like this.

Example: If you banish a shifted character with Simba – Rightful Heir, you still gain only 1 lore from his ability I Know What I Have to Do.
